name: CorrectedCalcium
title: Corrected Calcium
description: Note - "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable terms for predicted Corrected Calciums in serum or plasma.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to discover predicted Corrected Calcium results in clinical records),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes laboratory LOINC encoded observable terms representing predicted Corrected Calciums in serum or plasma.),(Exclusion Criteria: Laboratory LOINC encoded terms that do not represent predicted Corrected Calciums in serum or plasma)
